txt.en:
Corsair scouts have snuck up from behind and spotted our position. If they can get off three blows of their horn, reinforcements will come running! (Three scouts, one after the other, will attempt to blow their horn three times.)

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>empty</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#00FF00>Merit Gain:</rgb>
* Defeat scouts before third horn-blow 
  (with as few horn-blows as possible)
Keep scouts from blowing their horns three times.
